title: Over Here and Over There
description: In publishing this book I have no intention whatsoever to offer a work of great literary value.  As such it would undoubtedly be a failure, because, being of a non-English-speaking race, and only having been in this country a comparatively short time before going over to France, I cannot claim a mastery of the English language.  It has merely been my intention to express the spirit which led me to America and thence with Pershing's Expeditionary Forces to France.  (From Introductory)
